Propose Column Widths of an rtable object

Source: R/tt_toString.R
propose_column_widths.Rd

The row names are also considered a column for the output

propose_column_widths(x, mat_form = matrix_form(x, indent_rownames = TRUE))

Arguments

x

rtable object
mat_form

object as created with matrix_form

Examples

library(dplyr)

iris2 <- iris %>%
  group_by(Species) %>%
  mutate(group = as.factor(rep_len(c("a", "b"), length.out = n()))) %>%
  ungroup()

l <- basic_table() %>%
  split_cols_by("Species") %>%
  split_cols_by("group") %>%
  analyze(c("Sepal.Length", "Petal.Width"), afun = list_wrap_x(summary) , format = "xx.xx")

tbl <- build_table(l, iris2)

propose_column_widths(tbl)

#> [1] 12  4  4  5  5  5  4
